name: suroi
description: An open-source 2D battle royale game inspired by surviv.io

scripts.validateDefinitions: cd tests && pnpm run build && pnpm validateDefinitions
scripts.sanity-check: pnpm lint:check && pnpm typecheck && pnpm validateDefinitions
scripts.full-reinstall: rm -r node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml client/node_modules server/node_modules common/node_modules tests/node_modules translations/node_modules && pnpm install
scripts.full-reinstall-win:
del /f /s /q node_modules\* pnpm-lock.yaml client
ode_modules\* server
ode_modules\* common
ode_modules\* tests
ode_modules\* translations
ode_modules\* & pnpm install
